answers.answer: You can lose the plug hours before labour or weeks before.  Sorry

I dont know how far along you are but i was losing mine for a few weeks and dr was going to induce me for gestational diabetes but not before it was time...they want that baby in there for as long as possible.  if your water isnt broke you are ok...:)

Unfortunately, no one can give you a solid answer because everyone is different. It is common to lose it in one clump or a little bit over an extended period of time easily lasting a couple of weeks. I wish that we could tell you more, but you could go into labor in one minute or in several weeks. Best wishes to you!
I didnt lose mine all at once it came out bits here and bits there....I did this at least 2 to 4 weeks before I had her so it varys good luck and dont worry that baby will come soon enough!!

question: Please, can anyone give me a straight answer? It seems as if no woman i know can tell me anything. Seems like everyone gets induced these days so its hard to get a straight or i don't know answer! But my question is this! I have already lost my mucus plug (as far as i can tell) but for the past 3 days i been losing more and more mucus and each time there comes more. How much of this do i or will i be losing befor labor actually begins? Because with my first child i was induced, i did lose my plug then too but it only came out once and that was it.
title: i'm gonna go crazy!!!
